attributes.action: Take legal action NOW to bar the family of Kabir Ahmed from EVER claiming welfare benefits in this country.
attributes.additional_details: It CANNOT be right that Muslims can go off to jihad comfortable in the knowledge that their wives and children will be kept in a life of luxury by taxpayers they despise, for the duration of their natural lives.  An announcement that families of jihadis will NEVER receive welfare benefits in this country MUST be made NOW.
